document.full_text: canadian singer michael buble married his longtime fiancee, actress luisana loreley lopilato de la torre, in a civil ceremony in buenos aires, argentina on thursday.
document.title: michael buble marries in buenos aires
lines_and_colors: canadian singer michael buble married his longtime fiancee, actress luisana loreley lopilato de la torre, in a civil ceremony in buenos aires, argentina on thursday.
